mapper.select: SELECT C.CARTITEM_ID as cartItemId, C.PRODUCT_ID as productId, P.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, C.USER_ID as userId, C.QUANTITY as quantity, P.PRODUCT_PRICE as price FROM CARTITEM C LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND C.USER_ID = #{userId}
